ovdesc.p: This application holds information about a T24 Update.

desc.p: Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Information on Symptoms of the bug. Can be many Symptoms.
The date that this Update should be released.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
If an update has been marked as released, then it is available to download.
This where the location of the T24 Update is.
The Product that this Update belongs to.
The version number of the update. This should be used to compare to installed Update on the customer environment.
The GA release number
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
A list of Problems that this Update will fix.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Clear instructions to the client on how to install this update.
The Component that this Update belongs to.
A list of any dependent Updates that must be installed along with the current one.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
A link to the location of any documents pertaining to the Update.
